titleStmt.title: The Romish chaine. By Edmund Gurnay, parson of Harpley
titleStmt.author: Gurnay, Edmund, d. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Mathew Law, and are to bee sold at his shop, neere Saint Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Variant: with an added leaf, inserted after A4, containing a dedication to Sir Roger Townsend.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
